now seeing an improved level of stability and visibility in the markets that we serve Broadcom Corp moved steadily lower throughout yesterdays session and cl osed down by at on above average volume View My Alerts IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE As requested your News Alert for QCOM follows from E quityAlertcom Qualcomms Sullivan Named HR Executive Of The Year Three Others Join HR Honor Roll HORSHAM Pa Oct BUSINESS WI RE Human Resource Executive a leading HR business magazine recently n amed Daniel L Sullivan PhD executive vice president of human resources at Qualcomm Inc in San Diego the HR Executive of the Year In add ition three other individuals were named to the HR Honor Roll David L Murphy vice president of human resources at Ford Motor Co Anne Szosta k executive vice president and director of human resources and diversity a t FleetBoston Financial Corp and Francesca M Spinelli senior vice presi dent of people at RadioShack Corp Winners were recognized on Oct dur ing a special awards dinner sponsored by PeopleSoft aboard the yacht Chere Amie which launched from the Glorietta Bay Marina in San Diego Judges f or this years contest included Joan Crockett senior vice president of HR at Allstate Insurance Lawrence J Kelleher senior vice president of human resources at Florida Power Light Fred Foulkes director of the Human Re source Policy Institute and professor of management policy at the Boston Un iversity School of Management Dr Jac Fitzenz founder and chairman of th e Saratoga Institute and David Shadovitz editorinchief of Human Resourc e Executive The judges based their selections on the following criteria the candidates ability to handle significant problems or obstacles in the human resource field the candidates role andor success in establishing the human resource function as an integral part of his or her organization the candidates management skills as demonstrated within the human resourc e function and his or her contributions to the HR profession as a whole The HR Executive of the Year and HR Honor Roll winners will be profil ed in the November issue of Human Resource Executive Human Resourc e Executive published by LRP Publications is based in Horsham Pa CONT ACT Human Resource Executive David Shadovitz URL Todays News On T he Net Business Wires full file on the Internet with Hyperlinks to your home View My Alerts IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE As requested your News Alert for YHOO follows from E quityAlertcom MonsterMail Takes On AOL MSN and Yahoo in Battle to Protect Children Parents and Others From Spam Pornography and Viruses BOSTON Oct BUSINESS WIRE MonsterMail Inc wwwmonsterma ilcom launches the worlds first email filtering and forwarding service today designed to protect you and your children from junk email spam and viruses while never losing contact when you change jobs move or sw itch ISPs Best of all its not another email account you have to check Enter almost any chat room and your screen name or email address will be harvested within minutes with pornography flowing freely into your emai l inbox Imagine what kids that spend hours in these chat rooms receive in their inbox on a daily basis often through no fault of their own says MonsterMail CEO Mike Hren MonsterMail enables you to literally turn yo ur email inbox upside down by only forwarding email on your approved c ontact list maintained on the MonsterMail servers Unlike Hotmail Monste rMail is not another inbox to check Its a monster email filter ridin g above all the spammers trying to reach you all the friends family and contacts you want to hear from and all your existing email accounts J an Gill a working mother of two says The only way I could protect mysel f or my kids on email was to get free accounts from Hotmail or Yahoo an d then let the accounts expire Unfortunately this is like throwing out th e baby with the bath water I would lose touch with the stuff I did want and who has time to check extra email accounts from work The average person has or email accounts they dont need another one says busi ness executive Jim Zahka What they need is ONE filtering and forwarding a ddress to give to everyone stopping the bad guys before they even enter y our house allowing the good guys to reach you even when your underlying e mail addresses change and easily controlling both from any existing email account or web browser With no hardware or software to install or down load a day free trial and a referral credit when friends and family signup MonsterMail wwwmonstermailcom is the best way to protect your self and your kids on email in a crazy online world CONTACT MonsterMail Mike Hren URL irecom Todays News On The Net Business Wires full View My Alerts IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE As requested your News Alert for TXN follows from Eq uityAlertcom Texas Instruments and RADVISION Team to Offer Fully Inte grated Silicon and Software Solutions for IP Phones and GatewaysDBundled VoIP Solution for MEGACO and Hbased IP Phones and Gateways Enables Fas ter Time to Market and Reduced Costs DALLAS and MAHWAH NJ Oct PRNewswire via COMTEX Texas Instruments Incorporated TI NYSE TXN the leader in digital signal processors DSPs and software solutions fo r voiceoverpacket applications and RADVISION Nasdaq RVSN the leading provider of awardwinning industrystandard products and technology for r ealtime voice and video over IP VoIPTM today announced an agreement to bundle RADVISIONs MEGACOH in TIs IP Phone and VoIP residentialsmal l office home office SOHO gateway solutions TI is already offering RADVI SIONs H enabling technology in their voice over IP VoIP Phone chipse t Customers purchasing a VoIP solution from TI will now have direct access to the RADVISION protocol toolkits that best suit their development needs This approach shortens new product timetomarket and reduces development costs This offering includes all the necessary silicon components soft ware and even a blueprint of how to build your IP Phone or residentialSOHO gateway for manufacturers This solution will make it simpler quicker and easier for developers of VoIP communication devices said Gadi Tamari CE O of RADVISION Companies can concentrate on developing unique capabilitie s and innovative industrial designs for their devices because programming i ntense functionality and intelligence have been developed and integrated fo r them in the chipset The Texas InstrumentsRADVISION solution reduces the need for complex engineering and testing which are some of the biggest bot tlenecks in developing new technologies TI is dedicated to providing t he silicon and software our customers require to address the needs of the V oIP market which is why were working with RADVISION to bundle MEGACO and H with our existing solutions said Bill Simmelink general manager Vo IP Business Unit at Texas Instruments Customers will benefit from the inc orporation of RADVISIONs protocol toolkits with TIs IP Phone and VoIP gat eway solutions to shorten their timetomarket and provide access to besto fclass technologies for their products About the Texas InstrumentsRAD VISION Solution Both the IP Phone and residentialSOHO gateway solutions feature lowpower highlyintegrated processors with TI DSP cores RISC pro cessors and Telogy SoftwareTM TIs IP Phone solution features the TMS C and TIs VoIP codec and the VoIP residentialSOHO gateway solution features the TNETV processor The TIRADVISION solution offers manufact urers all the system software and support needed for quick and easy develop ment of IP Phones and gateways TIs Telogy Software products feature a v ariety of standardsbased packetnetwork protocols and user interfaces for customer applications The VoIP software includes signaling telephony and protocolprocessing modules as well as networkmanagement APIs The softwar e addresses qualityofservice issues such as network delay jitter and lo st packets and incorporates compression lineecho cancellation Gcom pliant and tone detection Customers can license a specific embedded RAD VISION toolkit that meets their development requirements RADVISION has mod els for MEGACO and Hbased IP Phones and H media gateways and trunk ing gateways About Texas Instruments For OEMs developing broadband co mmunications solutions TIs advanced signal processingbased silicon and s oftware platforms deliver the optimal performance lower power consumption and system level integration required to rapidly deploy differentiated nex t generation products for cable modems digital subscriber line xDSL mode ms integrated access devices IADs Voice over Internet Protocol VoIP g ateways carrier infrastructure and home and office wireless networking S ee wwwticomscbroadband Texas Instruments Incorporated is the world le ader in digital signal processing and analog technologies the semiconducto r engines of the Internet age The companys businesses also include sensor s and controls and educational and productivity solutions TI is headquart ered in Dallas Texas and has manufacturing or sales operations in more tha n countries Texas Instruments is traded on the New York Stock Exchang e under the symbol TXN More information is located on the web site at http wwwticom About RADVISION RADVISION is a leading provider of produ cts and technology for realtime voice video and data communications over packet networks this includes the Internet and other Internet Protocol I P based networks Recognized universally as the experts in realtime voice and video over IP VoIP RADVISION offers the broadest and most complete set of enabling technology and networking systems needed to enable enterpr ises and service providers to migrate their voice and video communications from traditional telephone networks to new converged networks Today hundr eds of thousands of endusers around the world communicate over nextgenera tion networks using IPcentric products and solutions built around RADVISI ON products and technology RADVISIONs multiprotocol software toolkits fo r developers of IP communications include SIP MEGACO MGCP and H RA DVISIONs VoIP networking products include gateways conferencing bridges and gatekeeper applications For more information please visit RADVISION s website at This press release contains forwa rdlooking statements that are subject to risks and uncertainties Factors that could cause actual results to differ materially from these forwardloo king statements include but are not limited to general business condition s in the industry changes in demand for products the timing and amount or cancellation of orders and other risks Live in Tuscany Italy Now Available On Demand SUNNYVALE Calif Oct ENTERTAINMENT WIRE Yahoo NasdaqYHOO WHAT Sting s emotional live concert in Tuscany Italy on Tuesday Septem ber th is now available on demand on YahooR Broadca st The performance was recorded i n front of a select audience of friends and lucky contest winne rs for an album entitled All This Time which is scheduled to be released by ARecords in the United States on November th Originally scheduled as a live webcast on September th Sting and his band decided to limit the worldwide br oadcast to a single moving performance of Fragile followed by a minute of silence in honor of the thousands of people who lo st their lives in the tragic events of that day Following the conclusion of the webcast the concert resumed and a onehour e dited version of the performance can now be viewed on Yahoo Br oadcast WHO One of the most influential creative and sociallyconscious artists of his generation Sting continues to break new ground in his remarkable career For his concert i n Tuscany the GrammyRaward winning singer and songwriter backed by his longtime band and several guest musicians pe rforms songs from his tripleplatinum album Brand New Day as well as some of his celebrated hits including Fragile A Thous and Years and Roxanne In his inimitable style Sting reinvents these songs through reconstructed arrangements The intimate and reflective mood of the night is captured in an u nforgettable performance WHEN The concert webcast is available on d emand at Yahoo Broadcast through November th WHERE
